widget.name: Close Call
widget.description: Don't want to talk to others? Shareing your ideas, images, and memes? Without wifi? Message your ideas with others, all of those around you. Airplaine Mode and turn on bluetooth, that's all you need. Descrete, untracable messaging within an area as close as within a shout.
